languages.text: {n}Кибермастиф оскаливает зубы, и Соломон мигом тянет ошейник на себя, усмиряя пса.{/n} "Чем бы он ни был поражен, это настолько опасно, что у Глейто едва не активировались протоколы самозащиты. Я такое только раз в жизни видел".

{n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибермастиф оскаливает зубы, и Соломон мигом тянет ошейник на себя, усмиряя пса.{/n} "Чем бы он ни был поражен, это настолько опасно, что у Глейто едва не активировались протоколы самозащиты. Я такое только раз в жизни видел".

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar, calming him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen it happen once before."

{n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar, calming him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen it happen once before."

{n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

{n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

{n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

{n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

languages.text: {n}格雷托露出了牙齿，索罗蒙赶紧扯住了它的项圈，让它安静下来。{/n}“我不知道它这是怎么了，但刚刚的情况非常危险，差点触发了格雷托的自我防卫协议。像这样的事情，以前只发生过一次。”
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托露出了牙齿，索罗蒙赶紧扯住了它的项圈，让它安静下来。{/n}“我不知道它这是怎么了，但刚刚的情况非常危险，差点触发了格雷托的自我防卫协议。像这样的事情，以前只发生过一次。”

languages.text: {n}Glaito enseña los dientes y Solomorne tira rápidamente de su collar para tranquilizarlo.{/n} «No sé qué mal le aflige, pero es lo bastante peligroso como para casi activar los protocolos de autodefensa de Glaito. Eso solo había ocurrido una vez».
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito enseña los dientes y Solomorne tira rápidamente de su collar para tranquilizarlo.{/n} «No sé qué mal le aflige, pero es lo bastante peligroso como para casi activar los protocolos de autodefensa de Glaito. Eso solo había ocurrido una vez».

languages.text: {n}Glaito retrousse les babines et Solomorne empoigne fermement son collier pour le calmer.{/n} « Je ne sais pas exactement ce qui l'afflige, mais c'est suffisamment dangereux pour avoir déclenché les protocoles d'autodéfense de Glaito. Cela ne nous était arrivé qu'une seule fois jusqu'à aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito retrousse les babines et Solomorne empoigne fermement son collier pour le calmer.{/n} « Je ne sais pas exactement ce qui l'afflige, mais c'est suffisamment dangereux pour avoir déclenché les protocoles d'autodéfense de Glaito. Cela ne nous était arrivé qu'une seule fois jusqu'à aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: {n}グライトは牙をむいた。ソロモーンはすぐに彼の首輪を引っ張って落ち着かせた。{/n}「彼を襲ったどんな疫病も、グライトの自己防衛プロトコルをもう少しで発動させるほど危険です。このようなことは以前に一度しか見たことがありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトは牙をむいた。ソロモーンはすぐに彼の首輪を引っ張って落ち着かせた。{/n}「彼を襲ったどんな疫病も、グライトの自己防衛プロトコルをもう少しで発動させるほど危険です。このようなことは以前に一度しか見たことがありません」

languages.text: {n}Glaito dişlerini gösteriyor, Solomorne da hızla onu sakinleştirmek için tasmasına asılıyor.{/n} "Onu etkileyen lanet her neyse Glaito'nun savunma protokolünü etkinleştirecek kadar tehlikeli. Bunu daha önce sadece bir kez gördüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito dişlerini gösteriyor ve Solomorne hızla onu sakinleştirmek için tasmasına asılıyor.{/n} "Onu etkileyen lanet her neyse Glaito'nun savunma protokolünü etkinleştirecek kadar tehlikeli. Bunu daha önce sadece bir kez gördüm."

languages.text: {n}Glaito fletscht die Zähne, und Solomorne zieht sofort an seinem Halsband, um ihn zu beruhigen.{/n} "Von welcher Seuche er auch immer befallen ist, sie ist gefährlich genug, um Glaitos Selbstverteidigungsprotokolle auszulösen. Das ist bisher erst einmal passiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his teeth, and Solomorne quickly tugs at his collar to calm him down.{/n} "Whatever blight has afflicted him, it's dangerous enough that it almost set off Glaito's self-defence protocols. I have only seen this happen once before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito fletscht die Zähne, und Solomorne zieht sofort an seinem Halsband, um ihn zu beruhigen.{/n} "Von welcher Seuche er auch immer befallen ist, sie ist gefährlich genug, um Glaitos Selbstverteidigungsprotokolle auszulösen. Das ist bisher erst einmal passiert."
